mediaData.heading: WASTE MANAGEMENT FIRM NEPRA RAISES SERIES B FUNDING FROM AAVISHKAAR, ASHA IMPACT -June 2018
mediaData.summary: Nepra Resource Management Pvt. Ltd, a waste management company that operates under the 'Let's Recycle' brand, has raised Rs 44 crore ($6.5 million) in its Series B round of funding. The funds were raised from existing impact investor Aavishkaar and new impact investor Asha Impact, Nepra said in a statement.

mediaData.summary: Names like Airbnb, Dropbox, Zenefits, Instacart, and Reddit are among the billion-dollar companies that were incubated by Y Combinator at an early stage. Since 2005, Y Combinator, a California-based seed accelerator, has funded over 1,400 startups, which today have a combined valuation of over $80 billion.
